p: However, it appears that the use of TI in ethnomedicine has not been for the treatment of a single specific ailment but for a range of unrelated disorders. Various ethnomedicinal uses of TI, as gathered as mentioned in numerous articles and books related to Sri Lankan Traditional Medicine and Ayurveda medicine, are shown in Table 1. The ethnomedicinal use of TI spreads across disorders associated with a range of bodily systems. Therefore, Table 1 demonstrates these ethnomedical uses being categorized according to the body systems, ailments, and the parts of the plant used.
